title: godoc show error when using $PAGER
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

1. godoc html | less

What is the expected output?

  nothing output gracefully.

What do you see instead?

  template: package.txt:55: write /dev/stdout: The pipe is being closed.
  2011/12/13 17:25:47 packageText.Execute: template: package.txt:55: write /dev/stdout: The pipe is being closed.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?


Which operating system are you using?

  Windows XP

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

  f03312eab4ce+ tip

Please provide any additional information below.

  I modified syscall/zsyscall_windows.go, And get the value of error code.
  It was 232(meaning: The pipe is being closed).
